FileEntrySync.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The FileEntrySync interface represents a file in a file system. It lets you write content to a file.

blockquote.para:
This interface is deprecated and is no more on the standard track.
Do not use it anymore. Use the File and Directory Entries API instead.

remarks.para:
-File and Directory Entries API
-Basic Concepts About the File and Directory Entries API
